from vpython import *

# Screen Settings
scene = canvas(width = 700, height = 400, center = vector(0, -0.2, 0))

# Object Motion & Parameter Settings
pivot = vector(0, 0, 0)
rod = cylinder(pos=pivot, axis=vector(0, -1, 0), radius=0.01)
bob = sphere(pos=vector(0, -1, 0), radius=0.1, color=color.yellow)

# Initialize Variables
angle = 10 * (pi / 180)
bob.pos = vector(1 * sin(angle), -1 * cos(angle), 0)
rod.axis = bob.pos - pivot
Speed_I = 0
dt = 0.0001
g = 9.81
l = 1

# Animation
while True:
    rate(10000)
    acceleration = (-g / l) * sin(angle)
    Speed_I += acceleration * dt
    angle += Speed_I * dt
    bob.pos = vector(l * sin(angle), -l * cos(angle), 0)
    rod.axis = bob.pos - pivot

from vpython import *

scene = canvas(width=700, height=400)

# parameters
g = 9.8
l = 9.8
theta = 10*pi/180

# initial conditions
t = 0
dt = 0.01
w = 0
theta = 10*pi/180

# create objects
ceiling = box(pos=vector(0,0,0), size=vector(0.2, 0.01, 0.2), color=color.blue)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(l*sin(theta), -l*cos(theta), 0), radius=0.2, color=color.red)
string = cylinder(pos=ceiling.pos, axis=ball.pos-ceiling.pos, radius=0.01)

# animation
while True:
    rate(100)
    w = w - g/l*sin(theta)*dt
    theta = theta + w*dt
    ball.pos = vector(l*sin(theta), -l*cos(theta), 0)
    string.axis = ball.pos
